sentence: And if they're not voting for Brian Kemp, they're not going to be able to vote for Herschel Walker.? The ARW poll also tested Walker in his primary race and found him leading his closest opponent by nearly 50 points, an outsize lead that Walker has held throughout the primary.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Holds 38-Point Lead over David Perdue
